messages.message:
hi team, in build, i try to add a conf rule for all fields for a specific class.
if i do so, the “conf rule for all fields” will be applied for all fields & classes, although i choose it only from a specific class.
is this on purpose?
@Paul H can you look into this?

I think @Weiming Wu fixed this recently. I recall reviewing one of his PRs.
This one: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/66517 ~but seems like it’s not desired behavior hm~

I fixed a different thing. This is an expected behavior - all fields refers to all fields in the project. 
I didn’t write this code originally so I don’t understand the design context. Iirc @danny.lan made the changes. Can you give context?
